units.name: vsts-agent1.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=vsts-agent1
After=docker.service network.target
Requires=docker.service network.target

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill vsts-agent1
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm vsts-agent1
ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/docker pull microsoft/vsts-agent:ubuntu-16.04-docker-17.12.0-ce-standard
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run --name vsts-agent1 -e VSTS_ACCOUNT=<Account> -e VSTS_TOKEN=<Token> -e VSTS_POOL=ubuntu-16-04-docker-17-12-0-ce-standard -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock microsoft/vsts-agent:ubuntu-16.04-docker-17.12.0-ce-standard

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
